text: Olexandr Bortnyk (born 18 October 1996) is a Ukrainian chess player. He was awarded the title Grandmaster by FIDE in 2015, at the age of 19. He is considered a top blitz and bullet chess player. ==Career== In 2014, Bortnyk won the World Youth Chess Championships in the Under 18 category. Oleksandr Bortnyk has an older brother, Mykola Bortnyk, who also plays chess and holds the title International Master. Both Oleksandr and Mykola play chess online at Chess.com. Oleksander reached the finals of their Bullet Chess Championship, but was then defeated by the winner, Hikaru Nakamura. ==External links== * *Olexandr Bortnyk chess games at 365Chess.com * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Ukrainian chess players Category:World Youth Chess Champions Category:People from Oleksandrivka, Mykolaiv Oblast
title: Olexandr Bortnyk
